resources.string: "This app was conceived, designed, and developed by GigaStorm Developers. We hope you enjoy it. If you have any suggestions, feel free to send us an email using the button below. Or, you can give the app a rating on the Google Play Store.\n\nIf you are a developer and want to contribute to the project, search for twinrinks-mobile on github or send us an email to learn more."
